title.narrative: Eye health in Muchinga and Eastern Province

description.narrative: ​To contribute to sustainable provision and increased demand for eye care services at the district level for people in four districts of Zambia

participating-org.narrative: Zambia National Federation of the Blind (ZANFOB)
